languages.text: {n}Маражай безучастно наблюдает за тем, как вы умерщвляете ксеноса.{/n} "Ты наиграл{mf|ся|ась}? Нам пора двигаться дальше — прямо в пасть тем, кто считает себя хитрее нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай безучастно наблюдает за тем, как вы умерщвляете ксеноса.{/n} "Ты наиграл{mf|ся|ась}? Нам пора двигаться дальше — прямо в пасть тем, кто считает себя хитрее нас".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai watches impassively as you dispatch the xenos.{/n} "Had enough fun yet? We need to move on, straight into the maw of those who think they can outwit us."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай безучастно наблюдает за тем, как вы умерщвляете ксеноса.{/n} "Ты наиграл{mf|ся|ась}? Нам пора двигаться дальше — прямо в пасть тем, кто считает себя хитрее нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai impassively watches as you do away with the xenos.{/n} "Had your fun yet? We need to move on, straight into the maw of those who fancy themselves smarter than we are."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai impassively watches as you do away with the xenos.{/n} "Had your fun yet? We need to move on, straight into the maw of those who fancy themselves smarter than we are."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai watches impassively as you dispatch the xenos.{/n} "Had enough fun yet? We need to move on, straight into the maw of those who think they can outwit us."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai watches impassively as you dispatch the xenos.{/n} "Had enough fun yet? We need to move on, straight into the maw of those who think they can outwit us."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai watches impassively as you dispatch the xenos.{/n} "Had enough fun yet? We need to move on, straight into the maw of those who think they can outwit us."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sieht teilnahmslos zu, wie du den Xenos tötest.{/n} "Na, genug Spaß gehabt? Wir müssen weiter, geradewegs in den Schlund derer, die glauben, sie könnten uns überlisten."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches impassively as you dispatch the xenos.{/n} "Had enough fun yet? We need to move on, straight into the maw of those who think they can outwit us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sieht teilnahmslos zu, wie du den Xenos tötest.{/n} "Na, genug Spaß gehabt? Wir müssen weiter, geradewegs in den Schlund derer, die glauben, sie könnten uns überlisten."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋无动于衷地看着你杀死了异形。{/n}“玩够了吗？我们得继续前进了，和那些自以为能骗过我们的人见个面。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches impassively as you dispatch the xenos.{/n} "Had enough fun yet? We need to move on, straight into the maw of those who think they can outwit us."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋无动于衷地看着你杀死了异形。{/n}“玩够了吗？我们得继续前进了，和那些自以为能骗过我们的人见个面。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous regarde éliminer les xénos, impassible.{/n} « Vous êtes vous suffisamment {mf|amusé|amusée} ? Allons nous précipiter entre les griffes de ceux qui s'estiment plus intelligents que nous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches impassively as you dispatch the xenos.{/n} "Had enough fun yet? We need to move on, straight into the maw of those who think they can outwit us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous regarde éliminer les xénos, impassible.{/n} « Vous êtes vous suffisamment {mf|amusé|amusée} ? Allons nous précipiter entre les griffes de ceux qui s'estiment plus intelligents que nous.
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mira impasible cómo matas al xenos.{/n} «¿Ya te has divertido bastante? Tenemos que seguir avanzando, directamente hacia aquellos que creen que pueden engañarnos».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches impassively as you dispatch the xenos.{/n} "Had enough fun yet? We need to move on, straight into the maw of those who think they can outwit us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mira impasible cómo matas al xenos.{/n} «¿Ya te has divertido bastante? Tenemos que seguir avanzando, directamente hacia aquellos que creen que pueden engañarnos».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}異種族が殺される様子を、マラズハイは無表情な顔でながめている。{/n}「もう十分楽しんだか？先に進むぞ。俺たちを出し抜けると思っている奴らのマウに向かってな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches impassively as you dispatch the xenos.{/n} "Had enough fun yet? We need to move on, straight into the maw of those who think they can outwit us."

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族が殺される様子を、マラズハイは無表情な顔でながめている。{/n}「もう十分楽しんだか？先に進むぞ。俺たちを出し抜けると思っている奴らのマウに向かってな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sen zenonun işini bitirirken Marazhai duygusuzca izliyor.{/n} "Yeterince eğlendin mi? Devam etmeli, kendini bizden zeki sananların yuvasına dalmalıyız."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai watches impassively as you dispatch the xenos.{/n} "Had enough fun yet? We need to move on, straight into the maw of those who think they can outwit us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sen zenonun işini bitirirken Marazhai duygusuzca izliyor.{/n} "Yeterince eğlendin mi? Devam etmeliyiz ve bizden daha zeki olduklarını sananların direkt yuvasına dalmalıyız."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
